General.Name: Hotéis Othon S.A
General.Description: Hotéis Othon S.A. operates hotels in Brazil. It operates 12 hotels in the Rio Janeiro, São Paulo, Belo Horizonte, Salvador, Fortaleza, Natal and Recifel regions. The company was founded in 1943 and is based in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, n° 955, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 20060-001
